issue.title: [Rust] Builder::slice_mut should take mut self
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2468](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2468). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`Builder` method `slice_mut` should take a `mut self` since it gets a mutable reference to data owned by the `Builder`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2468?focusedCommentId=16443638) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1907
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1907>
